Title: Standard Striker
minimums: Ground Move of 10'' or Jump of 8''.
reqs: No Units of Size 4 or larger.
50% of Units must be Striker or Skirmisher.
effect: 75% of Group gets Speed Demon for free.

Title: Light Striker
minimums: Ground Move of 10'' regardless of Jump capacity.
At least 2 Units have Long Range DMG value > 0.
At least 2 Units must be Striker or Skirmisher.
reqs: No Units of Size 3 or larger.
effect: 75% of Group gets Speed Demon for free.

Title: Heavy Striker
minimums: Ground Move of 18'' regardless of Jump capacity.
At least 3 Units have Long Range DMG value > 1.
At least 2 Units must be Striker or Skirmisher.
At least 3 Units must be Size 3 or larger.
effect: 75% of Group gets Speed Demon for free.
